issue.title: [C++] Provide bulk method on TypedBufferBuilder<bool> for appending a bitmap
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5983](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5983). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have `TypedBufferBuilder<bool>::UnsafeAppend` for an array of bytes (where non-zero becomes 1), but it would be useful to have also `UnsafeAppendBits` so that bitmaps coming from `arrow::Array` can also be appended
